text: Wesley So (born 9 October 1993) is a Filipino chess grandmaster. So got the GM title at the age of 14 years, 1 month and 28 days, making him the 8th youngest chess grandmaster.GmaNews.Tv, So is now RP's youngest GM, world's 7th youngest So's transfer to the United States Chess Federation was confirmed in the November 2014 rating list.FIDE confirms So's transfer to USCF Manila Times Published 30 October 2014FIDE Player transfers FIDE website Soon after, he left Webster University to focus full-time on chess. == References == Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Filipino sportspeople Category:People from Cavite
title: Wesley So
